body:
Making it consistent is good, I am just pointing out that there are some other declarations that are not consistent: 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5652049/48079004-7d774280-e1b8-11e8-95d2-02f6b84a08e5.png)
It would be great if you could make all of them consistent
